definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: Without experiences in mind, he pledged he would never let his own two-year old son face such difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 他發誓不會讓自己兩歲的兒子生活得那麼艱辛。

sentences.english: The general swore to take back this island whatever the cost.
sentences.chinese: 我位將軍發誓不惜任何代價奪回這個島。

sentences.english: My boyfriend have ever sweared to love me forever.
sentences.chinese: 我男朋友曾發誓說永遠愛我。

sentences.english: He has vowed never to enter the ring again.
sentences.chinese: 他發誓再也不進鬥牛場了。

sentences.english: I swore that I would take part in the voting with all my soul.
sentences.chinese: 我暗自對天發誓，下次投票我一定全心投入。

sentences.english: She swears that she will be avenged on her enemy sooner or later.
sentences.chinese: 她發誓遲早要向她的敵人報仇。

sentences.english: I swear, your love is all my life, what do you think?
sentences.chinese: 發誓此生之中你爲我最愛，又何想？

sentences.english: He promised never to betray the organization.
Abraham makes his servant put his hand under his thigh while swearing to God.
sentences.chinese: 亞伯拉罕讓他的僕人把手放在他的大腿下向上帝發誓。

sentences.english: I have spent my life vowed, I will work hard to not lose to anyone.
sentences.chinese: 我用我的生命發誓，我會努力，不輸給任何人。

sentences.english: Iago. I protest, in the sincerity of love and honest kindness.
sentences.chinese: 伊阿古我發誓這一種意思完全出於一片誠心。

sentences.english: He stands pledged to abolish slavery in Columbia (the district round Washington) under the conditions we have shown.
sentences.chinese: 他發誓要在現有的情況下廢除哥倫比亞特區的奴隸制。

sentences.english: I once swore again ignore her affair, accurate is again have been already failed to keep agree.
sentences.chinese: 我曾發誓說再不管她的事情，到底是又食言了。

sentences.english: Robert swears he will love me for ever and ever.
sentences.chinese: 羅伯特發誓他將永遠愛我。

sentences.english: I swear, this was the only traffic light we ever passed in Xinyang.
sentences.chinese: 我發誓，這是唯一的交通燈都過去了，我們在信陽。

sentences.english: I swear I caught a look of unbridled ecstasy on his furry little face as he dug his Lilliputian hands into the sugar and shoveled it into his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 我發誓看到了它在用小手抓糖送到口裏時的放縱狂喜。

definition: to let off/to let slip by/to let sb get away with sth
preferably/one would prefer to...(or not to...)/would rather/(would) be better to/(to pick) the lesser of two evils
to answer/to respond/to answer positively/to agree/to accept/to promise
to turn round/to turn one's head/later/by and by
lit. that person/fig. the person you have been looking for/Mr Right/the girl of one's dreams
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
